Description.Text: Come and fall in love with a boutique hotel built in a historic building from 1905 placed in a corner between two streets in the heart of old city. Each of the rooms at the Adamar feature bright, soft-tone co-lours and beds with luxury textiles. They all come equipped with free Wi-Fi and a satellite flat-screen TV. The beautifully designed Adamar Hotel has everything you need for a great holiday including a ultra-modern interiors and amenities to match. Built in a historic Istanbul building and with 5 floors of different co-lours and deluxe interiors, visitors will surely fall in love with the spectacular Adamar Hotel where the staff are as impressive as the hotel itself. Amenities - Dry cleaning, Lobby and Reception.
Sultanahmet Tram Stop is just 250 meters from the hotel. The Basilica Cisterns, Blue Mosque and Roman Hippodrome, Topkapi palace, Hagia Sophia,are in by walking distances.
